commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Belanosima:wght@400;700&family=Cormorant+Upright:wght@300;400;600;700&family=Noto+Sans&family=Outfit&family=Rubik:wght@400;500;700&display=swap');

        * {
            font-family: 'Cormorant Upright', serif;
            font-size: 30px;
            color: white;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-size: 100vw;

        }


        #oceane {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/Oceane/oceane_background.jpg);

        }

        #fleur {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/fleur/fleur_background.webp);
        }

        #epitres {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/epitres/epitres_background.webp);
        }

        #paix {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/paix/50ff2b_066da4f0793f4e4e86996128692cbb80~mv2.webp);
        }

        #coeur {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/coeur/50ff2b_1f8e841af30d4583a52b801f7b36e09f~mv2.webp);
        }

        #cocon {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/coeur/50ff2b_1f8e841af30d4583a52b801f7b36e09f~mv2.webp);
        }

        #denouement {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/denouement/50ff2b_6f5468e37e664f869bc5baf8fd1e5293-mv2.webp);
        }

        #envolee {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/envolee/50ff2b_e6575cac650e4bbcb1d905cdbd4c8e75~mv2_002.jpg);
        }

        #joie {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/joie/50ff2b_6876b8f736af47d2adf165d948918473~mv2_005.webp);
        }

        #source {
            background-image: url(images/Créations/source/source_2.webp);

        }

        .back-button {
            position: fixed;
            ;
            top: 10px;
            right: 50px;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .card_sculpture_img {
            display: flex;
            width: fit-content;
            margin: auto;
            text-align: center;


        }

        img {
            height: 60vh;
            display: flex;
            margin: 10px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            border: 1px solid white;
            box-shadow: black 0px 1px 8px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.22) 0px 15px 12px;
        }

        p {
            font-size: calc(16px + 1.390625vw);
            text-align: center;
            width: 70%;
            margin: 2vh auto;
        }

        h3 {
            font-size: calc(56px + 1.390625vw);
            margin: 0;
            font-weight: 900;
            text-align: center;
        }
    </style>
